metadata.description: Enterprise-grade AI marketing automation framework for Claude Code
metadata.longDescription: Complete marketing automation suite with 18 specialized agents, 90+ slash commands, 28 marketing skills, and interactive training. Covers campaigns, content, SEO, CRO, email, sales enablement, and analytics.
